attributes.background:
I want the government to look at certain gambling casino games that are destroying people lives and are obvious scam. 
The games that I'm concerned about are Crazy Time, Alice in wonderland, monopoly wheel. These game are not random!

rejection.details: It's not within the UK Government's responsibility to investigate specific gambling games. This is a matter for individual companies. You might be able to start a petition asking the Government to change regulation of gambling more widely, but you'd have to have a clear action for the Government to do.
